scene_description_enriched: Two bearded men stand in a verdant landscape under a blue sky. The man on the left wears a gold tunic and a dark blue cloak, holding a scroll inscribed with "Jonas." The man on the right wears a blue robe and a red and gold cloak, with a distinctive pointed hat. He holds a scroll that appears to be a continuation of the first, inscribed with "achias." Both figures are depicted in profile, engaged in conversation or presentation of their respective texts. The background features stylized trees and a distant, indistinct landscape.
